channel.title: Upcoming OECD Publication Embargoes and Launches
channel.description: A list of dates and publications

item.title: Les pratiques et les compétences des adultes en numératie
item.description: Les pratiques et les compétences des adultes en numératie by Directorate for Education and Skills has an embargo on Thursday, 26 July 2018, 10:00 Paris time (GMT+02:00).

item.title: Digital technology diffusion - A matter of capabilities, incentives or both?
item.description: Digital technology diffusion - A matter of capabilities, incentives or both? by Economics Department has an embargo on Monday, 30 July 2018, 2:00 Paris time (GMT+02:00).
